error.title: Error
error.loadingTeams: Failed to load teams. Please try refreshing the page.

meta.title: Pokémon Team Analysis
meta.description: Analyze your Pokémon team to see how they stack up against other teams.
meta.keywords: Pokémon, Analysis, Stats, Pokémon Go, VGC, Pokémon Battle, Pokémon Team, Ranked Battles

home.noTeamsDescription: Create your first Pokémon team to get started with analysis!
home.teamHasProblems: There are problems in the team

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.

meta.title: Privacy and Terms
meta.description: Our privacy policy and terms of service
meta.keywords: privacy policy, terms of service, legal, data protection

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our service.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.content: We may collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, contact us, or use our services.

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and comply with legal obligations.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at {email}.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using our service, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

useOfService.title: Use of Service
useOfService.content: You may use our service for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the service in any way that violates any applicable laws or regulations.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.content: You retain ownership of any content you submit, post, or display on or through the service. By submitting content, you grant us a license to use, modify, and display such content.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our service immediately, without prior notice, for any reason whatsoever.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: The information on this website is provided on an 'as is' basis. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at {email}.

teamImportModal.title: Import Pokémon Team

content.1: Select the appropriate game version and rules
content.2: Paste the team data in the text area below
content.3: Click "Import Team" to add it to your collection

teamImportModal.dataInputPlaceholder:
Paste your team here...

Example:
Incineroar (M) {'@'} Safety Goggles
Ability: Intimidate
Level: 50
Shiny: Yes
Tera Type: Fairy
EVs: 244 HP / 188 Def / 76 SpD
Impish Nature
IVs: 0 Spe
 - U - turn
 - Fake Out
 - Flare Blitz
 - Knock Off

deleteTeam.title: Delete Team
deleteTeam.message: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: Team Not Found
notFound.description: The team with ID "{id}" does not exist or has been deleted.

validationErrors.title: Team Validation Errors
validationErrors.description: Your team data has the following issues, please click the edit button to fix:

teamMembers.title: Team Members ({count}/6)
teamMembers.description: Below are the detailed information of Pokémon in your team

rawData.title: Raw Team Data
rawData.description: This is the original team text data you imported
rawData.copyButton: Copy raw team data to clipboard

meta.title: Resistance Analysis
meta.description: Analyze {name} team's type resistance with {count} Pokémon

resistance.title: Type Resistance Analysis
resistance.description: Analyze your team's resistance performance against various type attacks, with optional weather and terrain conditions.

validationError.description: Your team data has issues and cannot be analyzed for resistance. Please fix the team data first.

resistance.noEffectiveAttacks: All team members take normal damage from this type attack

meta.title: Coverage Analysis
meta.description: Analyze {name} team's offensive coverage with {count} Pokémon

coverage.title: Offensive Coverage Analysis
coverage.description: Analyze your team's offensive effectiveness against various type combinations and popular Pokémon.

validationError.description: Your team data has issues and cannot be analyzed for coverage. Please fix the team data first.

popularPokemon.title: Coverage Against Popular Pokémon
popularPokemon.description: How effectively your team can handle popular VGC Pokémon

typeHeatmap.title: Type Coverage Heatmap
typeHeatmap.description: Visualize your team's offensive coverage against all type combinations
